summary: A command‑line utility that fetches the AIShell speech corpus from a predefined URL, optionally downloads it with progress feedback, extracts the archive, and performs any necessary post‑processing to ready the data for downstream speech‑recognition experiments.
business_intent: Automate acquisition and preparation of the AIShell dataset so that developers and researchers can quickly obtain a ready‑to‑use speech corpus without manual downloading or extraction steps.
